page.title: 02ROMAN WALL
page.content: The{Roman Wall}surrounds the Roman city of Verulamium and is again surrounded by{Devils Dyke}which serves as a further defence against invaders. One of the many preserved pieces of the wall can be seen against the footpath which has railings on both sides with{Devils Dyke}on one side and the wall on the other.At the bottom of this particular stretch is the south east gate,now just patches of{Roman brickwork}arranged in three elipse shaped markings.In Roman times this would be very heavily guarded to prevent unauthorised entry or leaving.There were bridges at every gate crossing{Devils Dyke}although none of these are now in existence.
